html: This afternoon, The Child Welfare Provider Inclusion Act (H.R. 1881) was added to the FY 2019 Labor HHS appropriations bill by a vote of 29-23. This is a victory for waiting children, adoptive parents, child welfare service providers, and faith-based organizations.
text:
This afternoon, The Child Welfare Provider Inclusion Act (H.R. 1881) was added to the FY 2019 Labor HHS appropriations bill by a vote of 29-23. 

This is a victory for waiting children, adoptive parents, child welfare service providers, and faith-based organizations.

html: Thank you to @MikeKellyPA, @TomColeOK04, & @Robert_Aderholt for standing up for faith-based organizations, adoptive parents, and most importantly children waiting to be adopted by including the Child Welfare Provider Inclusion Act (H.R. 1881) in FY 19 LHHS appropriations bill.
text: Thank you to @MikeKellyPA, @TomColeOK04, & @Robert_Aderholt for standing up for faith-based organizations, adoptive parents, and most importantly children waiting to be adopted by including the Child Welfare Provider Inclusion Act (H.R. 1881) in FY 19 LHHS appropriations bill.

html: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act → Lowers tax rates Increases the standard deduction Eliminates special-interest deductions Expands the Child Tax Credit Preserves the Adoption Credit Preserves home mortgage interest deduction Repeals the Death Tax https://fairandsimple.gop/
text:
The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act →
Lowers tax rates
Increases the standard deduction
Eliminates special-interest deductions
Expands the Child Tax Credit
Preserves the Adoption Credit
Preserves home mortgage interest deduction
Repeals the Death Tax
https://fairandsimple.gop/
